name: Chopping Block
description:
Chopping Block

Build powerful dice  and fight through 10 battles against enemies with fishy intentions. Create combos from a mixture of 6 main effects and special die. Can you discover the secret technique to curse foes?

How to Play:
  • Auto fight with enemies
  • After a fight, you get 10 gold to spend on die faces to put on your dice
  • Fight again!
How to download game:
  • Have or install node.js
  • Unzip build
  • open terminal in unzipped build folder
  • run command "npx serve"
  • Open https://localhost:3000 in your browser of choice!
  • Play the game and enjoy!
